title: New runes and lvl cap removed
body:
When does it happen in EU server? what date?
Couldn't find it on 'Riot plz' or anywhere else.
Thank you.

replies.body: Our devs aim to make these changes during the preseason, but we don't have any specific dates yet.  Bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for now to stay updated!

> [{quoted}](name=Porocles,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=E8MUTyJ2,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-27T18:09:51.057+0000)
>
> Our devs aim to make these changes during the preseason, but we don't have any specific dates yet.  Bookmark our [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for now to stay updated!

Thanks!
